author: Rick Spilman
content: I am sorry to see this nation taken over by authoritarians.

author: ShipFinex FZCO
content: This is a deeply troubling report. Using unproven allegations, especially of such serious nature, without due process, evidence, or access to legal counsel to deport workers with valid visas raises grave human rights concerns. Targeting Filipino crew members under the guise of combating child pornography, while denying them basic legal protections, smacks of systemic abuse and racial profiling. The lack of transparency and accountability from CBP must be investigated immediately. No one should be stripped of their rights based on secret accusations.

author: Craig
content: I am sorry to see this page politicized.

author: Peter Wright
content: When will America waken up to the dictator Trump?
